content: fox beanie the fox beanie is a cute beanie for kids or adults the pattern has three sizes and it s worked from bottom up with 3 5 mm / us 4 needles suggested yarn is a non itchy sandnes garn double sunday in the example beanie i have used säiewool merino dk in colorway brilliant magic_ring fox but sandnes garn has an alternative foxy colour cognat 2745 which you can also use #foxbeanie © anna syrjänen size sizes 1 2 3 with brim circumference 45 50 55 cm / 17 5 19 5 21 5 inch gauge 20 sts x 28 rnds = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 on 3 5 mm us 4 needles needles and notions 3 5 mm us 4 circular needles and 3 5 mm us 4 double pointed needles unless you re using magic loop technique stitch markers if using magic loop tapestry needle suggested yarn dk weight yarn such as sandnes double sunday mc sandnes double sunday - cognat 2745 one skein or saiewool merino dk brilliant magic_ring fox less than 1 skein cc1 sandnes double sunday 3800 - bristol black less than 1 skein cc2 sandnes double sunday 2650 - beige less than 1 skein cc3 sandnes double sunday 1001 - white less than 1 skein instructions brim cast on 90 100 110 sts with the long-tail cast-on method or your preferred stretchy cast-on method with 3 5 mm us 4 circular needles join in the round and pm for bor work rib *k1 p1* for 2 rounds then start working according to the chart the pattern repeat is 10 sts so you ll repeat it 9 10 11 times on a round when you have finished the chart keep working with the cc1 and p all sts for one round this will be the folded edge then continue working with cc1 and k all sts for 20 rounds or 7 cm / 2 75 inch crown change to mc turn work and switch the working direction continue working with stockinette stitch and k all sts on the first round decrease evenly 2 -
